meanings.sent1: The vet dewormed the puppy to make it healthy.
meanings.sent2: I dewormed my cat to keep it safe from parasites.
meanings.sent3: After being dewormed, the kitten felt much better.
meanings.sent4: She dewormed the garden of pests, like a hero saving the day.
meanings.sent5: The farmer dewormed the livestock, ensuring their well-being.

meanings.sent1: Yesterday, I dewormed my dog to protect it.
meanings.sent2: She dewormed her horse before the competition.
meanings.sent3: The cat looked relieved after being dewormed.
meanings.sent4: He dewormed the entire house, banishing any unwelcome guests.
meanings.sent5: The vet quickly dewormed the sick animals, saving their lives.

meanings.sent1: The dewormed puppy was full of energy.
meanings.sent2: She adopted a dewormed kitten from the shelter.
meanings.sent3: The dewormed cat purred contentedly in her lap.
meanings.sent4: The dewormed garden flourished with new life.
